lyrics.lyric: Never Gonna Give You Up
lyrics.tlyric: 永不放弃你

lyrics.lyric: We're no strangers to love
lyrics.tlyric: 我们都是情场老手

lyrics.lyric: You know the rules and so do I
lyrics.tlyric: 你和我都知道爱情的规则

lyrics.lyric: A full commitment's what I'm thinking of
lyrics.tlyric: 我在想的正是一份实打实的承诺

lyrics.lyric: You wouldn't get this from any other guy
lyrics.tlyric: 你从其他人那里得不到的

lyrics.lyric: I just wanna tell you how I'm feeling
lyrics.tlyric: 我只是想告诉你我的感觉

lyrics.lyric: Gotta make you understand
lyrics.tlyric: 必须让你明白

lyrics.lyric: Never gonna give you up never gonna let you down
lyrics.tlyric: 永不放弃你，从不让你失望

lyrics.lyric: Never gonna run around and desert you
lyrics.tlyric: 永不舍弃你

lyrics.lyric: Never gonna make you cry never gonna say goodbye
lyrics.tlyric: 永不让你哭泣，从不对你说再见

lyrics.lyric: Never gonna tell a lie and hurt you
lyrics.tlyric: 永不对你撒谎，从不伤害你

lyrics.lyric: We've known each other for so long
lyrics.tlyric: 我们都彼此了解很长时间了

lyrics.lyric: Your heart's been aching but you're too shy to say it
lyrics.tlyric: 你很心痛因为你不好意思开口告白

lyrics.lyric: Inside we both know what's been going on
lyrics.tlyric: 事实上我们都知道我们的关系发展成了什么样子

lyrics.lyric: We know the game and we're gonna play it
lyrics.tlyric: 我们知道游戏规则并且乐此不疲

lyrics.lyric: And if you ask me how I'm feeling
lyrics.tlyric: 如果你问我感觉怎么样

lyrics.lyric: Don't tell me you're too blind to see
lyrics.tlyric: 不要告诉我你没看见
